name: Brakeimage
tagline: JS Beta Lib that split a images i different part and you can add some feature,
body:
# BrakeImage

![](http://elephanthinker.com/breakeimage/1.png)

![](http://elephanthinker.com/breakeimage/2.png)

![](http://elephanthinker.com/breakeimage/3.png)
JS Beta Lib that split a images i different part and you can add some feature,
Clone the Repositorie and open the index file.

Have Fun..... 


##Required
You need JQUERY.


## Config
var options;
options = {
    timeX: 20, /*Time of image*/
    img: '.br', /*Image Selecto could be ID or a CLass*/
    type: 'down', /*Time : line, up,down,sin*/
    gutter: 1, /* space between slices */
    position: 'none', /*Float: Right, Left or none*/
    factor: 3 /*Facto of separation in the top and bottom*/
};

    var x = new BreakImage(options);
